CustomFieldTranslation.help: FOR LDV ORGS ONLY WITH SFDO GUIDANCE. To avoid a Query Timeout in the rollup batch job in orgs with many millions of Accounts, this specifies the maximum number of Accounts processed in each batch.
CustomFieldTranslation.label: LDV: Account Hard Credit Chunk Size
CustomFieldTranslation.name: ChunkSize_Account_HardCredit__c
